title: Panic while restarting erigon (devel)
body:

Erigon version: devel v2022.02.02
OS & Version: Linux debian
Commit hash : Restarting after updating from ef6013faff0d10cfb2d4b9afbee8f0a1fe73fb94 to dffcc57ecc7fa64ea207cc9075a29e8874669327

Erigon panicked while restarting after updating. systemd service is set up with `KillSignal=SIGINT`
